name: Decide on Dolt Repository Structure & Separation
description: Evaluate whether to move the Dolt database (experiments/dolt_data/memory_db) to a separate Git repository for this project, based on workflow feedback. Implement the move if decided.
action_items: [ ] Analyze pros/cons of separate Dolt repo vs. current monorepo structure (e.g., isolation, setup complexity, path handling in code).
[ ] Make a decision on the repository structure for the remainder of the POC.
[ ] (If Separating) Plan and execute the steps to move `experiments/dolt_data/memory_db` to a new Git repository (consider history preservation options).
[ ] (If Separating) Update relevant paths or configuration in the codebase if necessary.
test_criteria: [ ] A clear decision on repository structure is documented.
[ ] If separated, the new Dolt repository exists and the old path is removed/ignored.
[ ] If separated, code referencing Dolt data paths is updated or confirmed correct.
success_criteria: [ ] A final decision on the Dolt repository structure for the POC is made and documented.
[ ] If separation is chosen, the Dolt database is successfully moved to its new repository.
current_status: Task definition created based on workflow feedback.
